name: Stage Fright
target: 1 creature/level, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart
text: You fill your targets with the sudden fear of failure. A creature that fails its saving throw takes a –4 penalty on ability checks, skill checks, and any checks that require concentration (such as casting a spell in difficult circumstances or operating a complex device).
target_zh: 1个生物/等级，彼此相距不得超过30尺
text_zh: 你让目标突然对失败充满恐惧。一个在豁免检定上失败的生物在属性检定、技能检定、和任何需要专注的检定上受到-4惩罚（例如在困难情况下施法或操作复杂装置）。
